pages.title: About Your 3D Printing Gallery
pages.intro: Welcome to Your 3D Printing Gallery! We empower 3D printing enthusiasts with a dynamic platform to showcase their creations, manage projects, and engage with the community. Our mission is to make hosting and sharing your 3D printing journey seamless and enjoyable.
pages.description: At Your 3D Printing Gallery, we combine cutting-edge serverless technology with beautiful, customisable designs to support your creativity and passion for 3D printing.

items.title: Our Mission
items.description: To provide a hassle-free platform for 3D printing enthusiasts to create and showcase their personal or business galleries.

items.title: Customisable Pages
items.description: Your gallery, your way. Easily customise pages like About, Services, and Contact to match your unique style and needs.

items.title: Integrated Stripe Payments
items.description: Easily monetise your creations with secure Stripe payment integration for your products or services.

items.title: Community Support
items.description: Engage with like-minded enthusiasts and share knowledge, inspiration, and tips to grow the 3D printing community.

items.title: Sleek & Scalable Technology
items.description: Powered by serverless technology for lightning-fast performance and scalability as your gallery grows.

pages.title: Your 3D Printing Gallery Services
pages.intro: Are you a 3D printing enthusiast looking to showcase your work, connect with others, or share your unique creations online? Imagine having a simple, clean, and customisable website—tailored to your needs, easy to update, and visually stunning.
pages.description: With ReFilament Web Services, building your own 3D printing portfolio site has never been easier. Our platform offers simplicity with powerful customisation, allowing you to focus on your creations without the hassle of complicated setups.

items.title: Simple Yet Powerful Design
items.description: Built with Tailwind CSS and Vue.js, your site combines simplicity with a responsive, modern layout that can be easily styled to match your brand or personality.

items.title: Fully Customisable Content
items.description: Our sites are powered by JSON data, allowing you to add, edit, or remove content effortlessly.

items.title: Rich Features for Creators
items.description: With gallery support, dynamic image sliders, and space to share your latest prints, highlight what you do best in style.

items.title: Flexible Hosting Options
items.description: Host your site wherever works best for you—on Vercel, GitHub Pages, or your own preferred platform.

items.title: Get Started Today
items.description: If you’re interested in a website that grows with your creativity, reach out to learn more or dive in.
